about: I am a software developer with experience in web application development with a focus on the backend.

skills.skill: Ability to work in a multidisciplinary team, seeking the success of the group in each project.

Strong skills in HTML, JavaScript, PHP, CSS.
Average skills and knowledge in Python.
Design, implementation, and maintenance of MongoDB and MySQL databases.
Very familiar with Microsoft Power BI.
MS Active Directory administration in help desk tasks.
